item.title: ‘Dexter’ Showrunner Criticizes ‘Original Sin’ Cancellation: “Wasn’t Handled Well”
item.description: Clyde Phillips says he had to inform the show’s cast and crew of the un-renewal.

item.title: ‘Dexter’ Showrunner Criticizes ‘Original Sin’ Cancellation: “Wasn’t Handled Well”
item.description: Clyde Phillips says he had to inform the show’s cast and crew of the un-renewal.

item.title: ‘Dexter: Original Sin’ Un-Renewed as Paramount Opts Out of Second Season
item.description: The prequel series won’t go ahead, but a writers room for season two of ‘Dexter: Resurrection’ is set to open soon.

item.title: ‘Dexter: Original Sin’ Un-Renewed as Paramount Opts Out of Second Season
item.description: The prequel series won’t go ahead, but a writers room for season two of ‘Dexter: Resurrection’ is set to open soon.
